DOC.criteria: 1 . NIDDM treat oral antidiabetic least 3 month , IDDM treat least 3 month document HbA1C ; 2 . Diagnosis angina pectoris define Canadian Cardiovascular Society Classification ( CCS I , II , III , IV ) OR unstable angina pectoris ( Braunwald Classification B III ) OR patient document silent ischemia ; 3 . Target lesion stenosis > 50 % ( visual estimate ) ; 4 . Target vessel diameter , 2.5 3.0 mm 5 . Target lesion length minimum 15 mm maximum 30mm 1 . CK CKMB enzymes normal elevated troponin level ( determine site criterion ) time treatment ; 2 . Has unstable angina classified Braunwald III B A C IIIIII , periinfarction ; 3 . Unprotected leave main coronary disease > =50 % stenosis ; 4 . Significant ( > 50 % ) stenosis proximal distal target lesion might impede inflow runoff revascularized index procedure ; 5 . Have ostial target lesion ; 6 . Documented leave ventricular ejection fraction < =30 % ; 7 . InStent restenosis ; 8 . Chronic total occlusion .
